name: Learn with Pokémon: Typing Adventure
description:
Learn with Pokémon: Typing Adventure is an action game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Learn with Pokémon: Typing Adventure on Nintendo DS.
Hiroaki Tsuru, Hitoshi Yamagami and Takashi Fujii produced the game. It was directed by Manabu Yamana. Azusa Chiba, Kimihiro Abe and Masaharu Iwata scored the game.
